title: Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack, Bam Batmobile Redbird Prank Bibi & Quizz, Batcast Metal Diecast Vehicles, Ages 3+
descriptions: Introducing the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack! This set includes five Batcast Metal diecast vehicles, including the iconic Bam Batmobile, Redbird, Prank, Bibi, and Quizz. With working wheels and a compatibility with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately), this toy is perfect for kids aged 3 years and older. Encouraging imaginative play and storytelling, these vehicles bring the thrilling world of Super Hero versus Super-Villain racing action to life. Don't miss out on the chance to ignite your child's creativity and bring home this exciting 5-pack today!

With working wheels and compatibility with the Batwheels Race and Launch Batcave playset (sold separately), this 5-pack is sure to provide hours of fun for your little ones. Get ready for high-speed adventure with the Fisher-Price DC Batwheels 1:55 Scale Toy Cars 5-Pack!
